posts.title: Cotton Candy Machine
posts.content: Get your little monsters all hopped up on excess levels of sugar with this personal cotton candy machine. It features a straightforward design that is easy to operate and comes with a belt-driven performance grade motor that lets you make 1 fluffy cone every 30 seconds.

posts.title: Stormproof & Waterproof Matches
posts.content: These matches are the ultimate survival tool. Completely waterproof, they’ll light even if drenched. And once lit they cannot be blown out. Entirely windproof, they’ll even burn in a hurricane! Submerge a lit match in water? It will still continue to burn!

posts.title: Carolina Reaper Chocolate Bhutlah
posts.content: Pepperheads, feast your eyes on the Carolina Reaper chocolate bhutlah! This package comes with 5 seeds so that you can grow your very own incredibly spicy Carolina Reapers with a strong floral aroma and a hint that lovely smoky taste.

posts.title: Tea Making Alarm Clock
posts.content: Wake up to a nice piping hot cup of tea by placing this tea making alarm clock next to your bed. It features a compact design that’ll fit easily on your nightstand and comes with a built-in tea maker that’ll prepare you a   fresh cup every morning.

posts.title: Egg Replacement Smart Tray
posts.content: If you look up gratuitously unnecessary technology in the dictionary, you’ll find a picture of the egg replacement reminder smart tray. The tray allows you to check your egg supply levels from your smart phone while you’re at the grocery store, or anywhere for that matter.

posts.title: Book Reading Light
posts.content: Everyone loves lying back and reading a book in bed at night, but no one loves it when their spouse turns off the light, leaving the book and reader in the darkness — with the book reading light, you can continue to read, while the darkness in the room is acceptable for sleep.

posts.title: LifeStraw Universal Water Bottle Filter
posts.content: Drink tap water without fearing for your health and well being by using the LifeStraw universal water bottle filter. This water bottle comes with a replaceable 2-stage filter that removes 99.999999% of waterborne bacteria and 99.999% of waterborne protozoan parasite.

posts.title: Bearded Ski Mask
posts.content: You don’t need skill to tackle those black diamond courses, just the incredible confidence instilled in you by wearing the bearded ski mask. This imposing beard is the stylish and eye catching way to keep your face warm from the howling cold air on the slopes.

posts.title: R/C Flying Hoverboard
posts.content: Carve up the sky and pull off amazing aerial stunts by getting your hands on this R/C flying hoverboard. It can be flown as either a paraglider or a hoverboard and boasts flight assist technology that will help you pull off some incredible tricks like a 720 degree spin.

posts.title: Floating Alligator Head Decoy
posts.content: Keep unwanted guests away from your local watering hole by scaring the bejeezus out of them with this floating alligator head decoy. This 22″ head is skillfully decorated and floats freely above the water’s surface to give it an incredible life-like appearance.

posts.title: Customizable LED Cinema Marquee
posts.content: Display a short message or quote in true Hollywood fashion by writing it on this customizable LED cinema marquee. This wall mountable marquee measures 12″ x 9″ x 2.5″ and comes with 100 letters, numbers, and characters.

posts.title: Kids Electronics Discovery Kit
posts.content: Teaching the little whipper snappers about electricity is easier and more fun than ever with this kids electronic discovery kit. This educational kit comes with 30 parts and instructions for over 100 enjoyable projects like an adjustable volume siren and a flashing light.
